name: John Park
tagline: Empowering businesses and individuals with data-driven solutions
bio: With over 10 years of experience in Excel automation and data analysis, I specialize in transforming complex business challenges into streamlined, automated solutions. My approach combines technical expertise with educational insight, helping organizations and professionals unlock the full potential of their data. I believe that the right tools and knowledge can revolutionize how we work, and I'm passionate about making advanced analytics accessible to everyone.
